pli-tv-pvr11:2.3: Vivādādhikaraṇassa dve ukkoṭā, anuvādādhikaraṇassa cattāro ukkoṭā, āpattādhikaraṇassa tayo ukkoṭā, kiccādhikaraṇassa eko ukkoṭo—
pli-tv-pvr11:2.4: imesaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ ime dasa ukkoṭā.
pli-tv-pvr11:5.4: Kati puggalā adhikaraṇaṁ ukkoṭentā āpattiṁ āpajjanti?
pli-tv-pvr11:6.4: Cattāro puggalā adhikaraṇaṁ ukkoṭentā āpattiṁ āpajjanti?
pli-tv-pvr11:7.2: Akataṁ kammaṁ, dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ, puna kātabbaṁ kammaṁ, anihataṁ, dunnihataṁ, puna nihanitabbaṁ, avinicchitaṁ, duvinicchitaṁ, puna vinicchitabbaṁ, avūpasantaṁ, duvūpasantaṁ, puna vūpasametabbanti—
pli-tv-pvr11:8.2: Tattha jātakaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ ukkoṭeti, tattha jātakaṁ vūpasantaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ ukkoṭeti, antarāmagge adhikaraṇaṁ ukkoṭeti, antarāmagge vūpasantaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ ukkoṭeti, tattha gataṁ adhikaraṇaṁ ukkoṭeti, tattha gataṁ vūpasantaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ ukkoṭeti, sativinayaṁ ukkoṭeti, amūḷhavinayaṁ ukkoṭeti, tassapāpiyasikaṁ ukkoṭeti, tiṇavatthārakaṁ ukkoṭeti—
pli-tv-pvr11:9.1: Katamehi catūhaṅgehi samannāgato puggalo adhikaraṇaṁ ukkoṭeti?
pli-tv-pvr11:9.2: Chandāgatiṁ gacchanto adhikaraṇaṁ ukkoṭeti, dosāgatiṁ gacchanto adhikaraṇaṁ ukkoṭeti, mohāgatiṁ gacchanto adhikaraṇaṁ ukkoṭeti, bhayāgatiṁ gacchanto adhikaraṇaṁ ukkoṭeti—
pli-tv-pvr11:9.3: imehi catūhaṅgehi samannāgato puggalo adhikaraṇaṁ ukkoṭeti.
pli-tv-pvr11:10.1: Katame cattāro puggalā adhikaraṇaṁ ukkoṭentā āpattiṁ āpajjanti?
pli-tv-pvr11:10.2: Tadahupasampanno ukkoṭeti ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ, āgantuko ukkoṭeti ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ, kārako ukkoṭeti ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ, chandadāyako ukkoṭeti ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ—
pli-tv-pvr11:10.3: ime cattāro puggalā adhikaraṇaṁ ukkoṭentā āpattiṁ āpajjanti.
pli-tv-pvr11:11.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṁ kiṁnidānaṁ, kiṁsamudayaṁ, kiṁjātikaṁ, kiṁpabhavaṁ, kiṁsambhāraṁ, kiṁsamuṭṭhānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr11:11.2: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ kiṁnidānaṁ, kiṁsamudayaṁ, kiṁjātikaṁ, kiṁpabhavaṁ, kiṁsambhāraṁ, kiṁsamuṭṭhānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr11:11.3: Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ kiṁnidānaṁ, kiṁsamudayaṁ, kiṁjātikaṁ, kiṁpabhavaṁ, kiṁsambhāraṁ, kiṁsamuṭṭhānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr11:11.4: Kiccādhikaraṇaṁ kiṁnidānaṁ, kiṁsamudayaṁ, kiṁjātikaṁ, kiṁpabhavaṁ, kiṁsambhāraṁ, kiṁsamuṭṭhānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr11:12.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṁ vivādanidānaṁ vivādasamudayaṁ vivādajātikaṁ vivādapabhavaṁ vivādasambhāraṁ vivādasamuṭṭhānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:12.2: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ anuvādanidānaṁ anuvādasamudayaṁ anuvādajātikaṁ anuvādapabhavaṁ anuvādasambhāraṁ anuvādasamuṭṭhānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:12.3: Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ āpattinidānaṁ āpattisamudayaṁ āpattijātikaṁ āpattipabhavaṁ āpattisambhāraṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:12.4: Kiccādhikaraṇaṁ kiccayanidānaṁ kiccayasamudayaṁ kiccayajātikaṁ kiccayapabhavaṁ kiccayasambhāraṁ kiccayasamuṭṭhānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:13.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṁ kiṁnidānaṁ, kiṁsamudayaṁ, kiṁjātikaṁ, kiṁpabhavaṁ, kiṁsambhāraṁ, kiṁsamuṭṭhānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr11:13.4: kiccādhikaraṇaṁ kiṁnidānaṁ, kiṁsamudayaṁ, kiṁjātikaṁ, kiṁpabhavaṁ, kiṁsambhāraṁ, kiṁsamuṭṭhānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr11:14.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṁ hetunidānaṁ, hetusamudayaṁ, hetujātikaṁ, hetupabhavaṁ, hetusambhāraṁ, hetusamuṭṭhānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:14.4: kiccādhikaraṇaṁ hetunidānaṁ, hetusamudayaṁ, hetujātikaṁ, hetupabhavaṁ, hetusambhāraṁ, hetusamuṭṭhānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:15.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṁ kiṁnidānaṁ, kiṁsamudayaṁ, kiṁjātikaṁ, kiṁpabhavaṁ, kiṁsambhāraṁ, kiṁsamuṭṭhānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr11:15.4: kiccādhikaraṇaṁ kiṁnidānaṁ, kiṁsamudayaṁ, kiṁjātikaṁ, kiṁpabhavaṁ, kiṁsambhāraṁ, kiṁsamuṭṭhānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr11:16.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṁ paccayanidānaṁ, paccayasamudayaṁ, paccayajātikaṁ, paccayapabhavaṁ, paccayasambhāraṁ, paccayasamuṭṭhānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:16.4: kiccādhikaraṇaṁ paccayanidānaṁ, paccayasamudayaṁ, paccayajātikaṁ, paccayapabhavaṁ, paccayasambhāraṁ, paccayasamuṭṭhānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:17.1: Catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ kati mūlāni, kati samuṭṭhānā?
pli-tv-pvr11:17.2: Catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ tettiṁsa mūlāni, tettiṁsa samuṭṭhānā.
pli-tv-pvr11:18.2: Vivādādhikaraṇassa dvādasa mūlāni, anuvādādhikaraṇassa cuddasa mūlāni, āpattādhikaraṇassa cha mūlāni, kiccādhikaraṇassa ekaṁ mūlaṁ, saṅgho—
pli-tv-pvr11:19.2: Vivādādhikaraṇassa aṭṭhārasabhedakaravatthūni samuṭṭhānā, anuvādādhikaraṇassa catasso vipattiyo samuṭṭhānā, āpattādhikaraṇassa sattāpattikkhandhā samuṭṭhānā, kiccādhikaraṇassa cattāri kammāni samuṭṭhānā—
pli-tv-pvr11:21.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr11:21.5: Katihi adhikaraṇehi, katisu ṭhānesu, katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr11:22.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ ekaṁ vipattiṁ bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr11:22.12: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr11:23.7: Bhikkhuṁ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁseti, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr11:24.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr11:24.5: Katihi adhikaraṇehi, katisu ṭhānesu, katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr11:25.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr11:25.5: siyā saṅghādisesāpattikkhandhena, siyā pācittiyāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena.
pli-tv-pvr11:25.7: Yā tā āpattiyo garukā tā āpattiyo ekena adhikaraṇena—
pli-tv-pvr11:25.13: Yā tā āpattiyo lahukā tā āpattiyo ekena adhikaraṇena—
pli-tv-pvr11:25.18: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr11:26.7: Bhikkhunī jānaṁ pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicchādeti, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr11:27.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr11:27.5: Katihi adhikaraṇehi, katisu ṭhānesu, katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr11:28.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr11:28.5: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā pācittiyāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena.
pli-tv-pvr11:28.7: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
pli-tv-pvr11:28.8: Yā sā āpatti anavasesā sā āpatti na katamena adhikaraṇena, na katamamhi ṭhāne, na katamena samathena sammati.
pli-tv-pvr11:28.9: Yā tā āpattiyo lahukā tā āpattiyo ekena adhikaraṇena—
pli-tv-pvr11:28.14: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr11:29.7: Ukkhittānuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ;
pli-tv-pvr11:29.10: bhedakānuvattakā bhikkhū yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanti, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr11:29.11: pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanti, āpatti pācittiyassa—
pli-tv-pvr11:30.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr11:30.5: Katihi adhikaraṇehi, katisu ṭhānesu, katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr11:31.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr11:31.5: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā saṅghādisesāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā pācittiyāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena.
pli-tv-pvr11:31.7: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
pli-tv-pvr11:31.8: Yā sā āpatti anavasesā sā āpatti na katamena adhikaraṇena, na katamamhi ṭhāne, na katamena samathena sammati.
pli-tv-pvr11:31.9: Yā sā āpatti garukā sā āpatti ekena adhikaraṇena—
pli-tv-pvr11:31.15: Yā tā āpattiyo lahukā tā āpattiyo ekena adhikaraṇena—
pli-tv-pvr11:31.20: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr11:32.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṁ hoti anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:32.2: Vivādādhikaraṇaṁ na hoti anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ, na hoti āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, na hoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ;
pli-tv-pvr11:32.3: api ca, vivādādhikaraṇapaccayā hoti anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:32.8: Yaṁ tattha bhaṇḍanaṁ kalaho viggaho vivādo nānāvādo aññathāvādo vipaccatāya vohāro medhakaṁ, idaṁ vuccati vivādādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:32.12: Tāya āpattiyā saṅgho kammaṁ karoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:32.13: Evaṁ vivādādhikaraṇapaccayā hoti anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:33.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ hoti āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti vivādādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:33.2: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ na hoti āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, na hoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ, na hoti vivādādhikaraṇaṁ;
pli-tv-pvr11:33.3: api ca anuvādādhikaraṇapaccayā hoti āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti vivādādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:33.5: Idha bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ anuvadanti sīlavipattiyā vā ācāravipattiyā vā diṭṭhivipattiyā vā ājīvavipattiyā vā.
pli-tv-pvr11:33.6: Yo tattha anuvādo anuvadanā anullapanā anubhaṇanā anusampavaṅkatā abbhussahanatā anubalappadānaṁ, idaṁ vuccati anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:33.10: Tāya āpattiyā saṅgho kammaṁ karoti, kiccādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:33.11: Evaṁ anuvādādhikaraṇapaccayā hoti āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti vivādādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:34.1: Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ hoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti vivādādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:34.2: Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ na hoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ, na hoti vivādādhikaraṇaṁ, na hoti anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ;
pli-tv-pvr11:34.3: api ca āpattādhikaraṇapaccayā hoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti vivādādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:34.5: Pañcapi āpattikkhandhā āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, sattapi āpattikkhandhā āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, idaṁ vuccati āpattādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:34.9: Tāya āpattiyā saṅgho kammaṁ karoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:34.10: Evaṁ āpattādhikaraṇapaccayā hoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti vivādādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:35.1: Kiccādhikaraṇaṁ hoti vivādādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti āpattādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:35.2: Kiccādhikaraṇaṁ na hoti vivādādhikaraṇaṁ, na hoti anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ, na hoti āpattādhikaraṇaṁ;
pli-tv-pvr11:35.3: api ca kiccādhikaraṇapaccayā hoti vivādādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti āpattādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:35.5: Yā saṅghassa kiccayatā karaṇīyatā apalokanakammaṁ ñattikammaṁ ñattidutiyakammaṁ ñatticatutthakammaṁ, idaṁ vuccati kiccādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:35.9: Tāya āpattiyā saṅgho kammaṁ karoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:35.10: Evaṁ kiccādhikaraṇapaccayā hoti vivādādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ, hoti āpattādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:37.1: Yasmiṁ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasammati—
pli-tv-pvr11:37.2: yattha sativinayo tattha sammukhāvinayo, yattha sammukhāvinayo tattha sativinayo, na tattha amūḷhavinayo, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ, na tattha yebhuyyasikā, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā, na tattha tiṇavatthārako.
pli-tv-pvr11:37.3: Yasmiṁ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca …pe…
pli-tv-pvr11:37.7: sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasammati—
pli-tv-pvr11:37.8: yattha tiṇavatthārako tattha sammukhāvinayo, yattha sammukhāvinayo tattha tiṇavatthārako, na tattha sativinayo, na tattha amūḷhavinayo, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ, na tattha yebhuyyasikā, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā.
pli-tv-pvr11:38.1: Sammukhāvinayoti vā sativinayoti vā ime dhammā saṁsaṭṭhā udāhu visaṁsaṭṭhā?
pli-tv-pvr11:38.2: Labbhā ca panimesaṁ dhammānaṁ vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṁ paññāpetuṁ?
pli-tv-pvr11:38.7: sammukhāvinayoti vā tiṇavatthārakoti vā—ime dhammā saṁsaṭṭhā, udāhu visaṁsaṭṭhā?
pli-tv-pvr11:38.8: Labbhā ca panimesaṁ dhammānaṁ vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṁ paññāpetuṁ?
pli-tv-pvr11:39.3: na ca labbhā imesaṁ dhammānaṁ vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṁ paññāpetuṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:39.10: na ca labbhā imesaṁ dhammānaṁ vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṁ paññāpetuṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:40.1: Sammukhāvinayo kiṁnidāno, kiṁsamudayo, kiṁjātiko, kiṁpabhavo, kiṁsambhāro kiṁsamuṭṭhāno?
pli-tv-pvr11:40.2: Sativinayo kiṁnidāno, kiṁsamudayo, kiṁjātiko, kiṁpabhavo, kiṁsambhāro, kiṁsamuṭṭhāno?
pli-tv-pvr11:40.3: Amūḷhavinayo kiṁnidāno, kiṁsamudayo, kiṁjātiko, kiṁpabhavo, kiṁsambhāro, kiṁsamuṭṭhāno?
pli-tv-pvr11:40.4: Paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ kiṁnidānaṁ, kiṁsamudayaṁ, kiṁjātikaṁ, kiṁpabhavaṁ, kiṁsambhāraṁ, kiṁsamuṭṭhānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr11:40.5: Yebhuyyasikā kiṁnidānā, kiṁsamudayā, kiṁjātikā, kiṁpabhavā, kiṁsambhārā, kiṁsamuṭṭhānā?
pli-tv-pvr11:40.6: Tassapāpiyasikā kiṁnidānā, kiṁsamudayā, kiṁjātikā, kiṁpabhavā, kiṁsambhārā, kiṁsamuṭṭhānā?
pli-tv-pvr11:40.7: Tiṇavatthārako kiṁnidāno, kiṁsamudayo, kiṁjātiko, kiṁpabhavo, kiṁsambhāro, kiṁsamuṭṭhāno?
pli-tv-pvr11:41.1: Sammukhāvinayo nidānanidāno, nidānasamudayo, nidānajātiko, nidānapabhavo, nidānasambhāro, nidānasamuṭṭhāno.
pli-tv-pvr11:41.4: paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ nidānanidānaṁ, nidānasamudayaṁ, nidānajātikaṁ, nidānapabhavaṁ, nidānasambhāraṁ, nidānasamuṭṭhānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:41.6: tassapāpiyasikā nidānanidānā, nidānasamudayā, nidānajātikā, nidānapabhavā, nidānasambhārā, nidānasamuṭṭhānā.
pli-tv-pvr11:41.7: Tiṇavatthārako nidānanidāno, nidānasamudayo, nidānajātiko, nidānapabhavo, nidānasambhāro, nidānasamuṭṭhāno.
pli-tv-pvr11:42.1: Sammukhāvinayo kiṁnidāno, kiṁsamudayo, kiṁjātiko, kiṁpabhavo, kiṁsambhāro, kiṁsamuṭṭhāno?
pli-tv-pvr11:42.7: tiṇavatthārako kiṁnidāno, kiṁsamudayo, kiṁjātiko, kiṁpabhavo, kiṁsambhāro, kiṁsamuṭṭhāno?
pli-tv-pvr11:43.1: Sammukhāvinayo hetunidāno, hetusamudayo, hetujātiko, hetupabhavo, hetusambhāro, hetusamuṭṭhāno.
pli-tv-pvr11:43.4: paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ hetunidānaṁ, hetusamudayaṁ, hetujātikaṁ, hetupabhavaṁ, hetusambhāraṁ, hetusamuṭṭhānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:43.6: tassapāpiyasikā hetunidānā, hetusamudayā, hetujātikā, hetupabhavā, hetusambhārā, hetusamuṭṭhānā.
pli-tv-pvr11:43.7: Tiṇavatthārako hetunidāno, hetusamudayo, hetujātiko, hetupabhavo, hetusambhāro, hetusamuṭṭhāno.
pli-tv-pvr11:44.1: Sammukhāvinayo kiṁnidāno, kiṁsamudayo, kiṁjātiko, kiṁpabhavo, kiṁsambhāro, kiṁsamuṭṭhāno?
pli-tv-pvr11:44.7: tiṇavatthārako kiṁnidāno, kiṁsamudayo, kiṁjātiko, kiṁpabhavo, kiṁsambhāro, kiṁsamuṭṭhāno?
pli-tv-pvr11:44.8: Sammukhāvinayo paccayanidāno, paccayasamudayo, paccayajātiko, paccayapabhavo, paccayasambhāro, paccayasamuṭṭhāno.
pli-tv-pvr11:44.11: paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ paccayanidānaṁ, paccayasamudayaṁ, paccayajātikaṁ, paccayapabhavaṁ, paccayasambhāraṁ, paccayasamuṭṭhānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr11:44.13: tassapāpiyasikā paccayanidānā, paccayasamudayā, paccayajātikā, paccayapabhavā, paccayasambhārā, paccayasamuṭṭhānā.
pli-tv-pvr11:44.14: Tiṇavatthārako paccayanidāno, paccayasamudayo, paccayajātiko, paccayapabhavo, paccayasambhāro, paccayasamuṭṭhāno.
pli-tv-pvr11:45.1: Sattannaṁ samathānaṁ kati mūlāni, kati samuṭṭhānā?
pli-tv-pvr11:45.2: Sattannaṁ samathānaṁ chabbīsa mūlāni, chattiṁsa samuṭṭhānā.
pli-tv-pvr11:45.9: yo ca deseti yassa ca deseti;
pli-tv-pvr11:46.2: Sativinayassa kammassa kiriyā, karaṇaṁ, upagamanaṁ, ajjhupagamanaṁ, adhivāsanā, appaṭikkosanā.
pli-tv-pvr11:46.7: tiṇavatthārakassa kammassa kiriyā, karaṇaṁ, upagamanaṁ, ajjhupagamanaṁ, adhivāsanā, appaṭikkosanā—
pli-tv-pvr11:47.1: Sammukhāvinayoti vā sativinayoti vā—ime dhammā nānatthā nānābyañjanā, udāhu ekatthā byañjanameva nānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr11:47.6: sammukhāvinayoti vā tiṇavatthārakoti vā—ime dhammā nānatthā nānābyañjanā, udāhu ekatthā byañjanameva nānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr11:47.7: Sammukhāvinayoti vā sativinayoti vā—ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca.
pli-tv-pvr11:47.12: sammukhāvinayoti vā tiṇavatthārakoti vā—ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca.
pli-tv-pvr11:48.1: Vivādo vivādādhikaraṇaṁ, vivādo no adhikaraṇaṁ, adhikaraṇaṁ no vivādo, adhikaraṇañceva vivādo ca?
pli-tv-pvr11:48.2: Siyā vivādo vivādādhikaraṇaṁ, siyā vivādo no adhikaraṇaṁ, siyā adhikaraṇaṁ no vivādo, siyā adhikaraṇañceva vivādo ca.
pli-tv-pvr11:49.2: Idha bhikkhū vivadanti dhammoti vā adhammoti vā …pe…
pli-tv-pvr11:49.3: duṭṭhullā āpattīti vā aduṭṭhullā āpattīti vā.
pli-tv-pvr11:49.4: Yaṁ tattha bhaṇḍanaṁ, kalaho, viggaho, vivādo, nānāvādo, aññathāvādo, vipaccatāya vohāro, medhakaṁ—
pli-tv-pvr11:50.2: Mātāpi puttena vivadati, puttopi mātarā vivadati, pitāpi puttena vivadati, puttopi pitarā vivadati, bhātāpi bhātarā vivadati, bhātāpi bhaginiyā vivadati, bhaginīpi bhātarā vivadati, sahāyopi sahāyena vivadati—
pli-tv-pvr11:53.1: Anuvādo anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ, anuvādo no adhikaraṇaṁ, adhikaraṇaṁ no anuvādo, adhikaraṇañceva anuvādo ca?
pli-tv-pvr11:53.2: Siyā anuvādo anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ, siyā anuvādo no adhikaraṇaṁ, siyā adhikaraṇaṁ no anuvādo, siyā adhikaraṇañceva anuvādo ca.
pli-tv-pvr11:54.2: Idha bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ anuvadanti sīlavipattiyā vā ācāravipattiyā vā diṭṭhivipattiyā vā ājīvavipattiyā vā.
pli-tv-pvr11:54.3: Yo tattha anuvādo, anuvadanā anullapanā anubhaṇanā anusampavaṅkatā abbhussahanatā anubalappadānaṁ—
pli-tv-pvr11:55.2: Mātāpi puttaṁ anuvadati, puttopi mātaraṁ anuvadati, pitāpi puttaṁ anuvadati, puttopi pitaraṁ anuvadati, bhātāpi bhātaraṁ anuvadati, bhātāpi bhaginiṁ anuvadati, bhaginīpi bhātaraṁ anuvadati, sahāyopi sahāyaṁ anuvadati—
pli-tv-pvr11:58.1: Āpatti āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, āpatti no adhikaraṇaṁ, adhikaraṇaṁ no āpatti, adhikaraṇañceva āpatti ca?
pli-tv-pvr11:58.2: Siyā āpatti āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, siyā āpatti no adhikaraṇaṁ, siyā adhikaraṇaṁ no āpatti, siyā adhikaraṇañceva āpatti ca.
pli-tv-pvr11:63.1: Kiccaṁ kiccādhikaraṇaṁ, kiccaṁ no adhikaraṇaṁ, adhikaraṇaṁ no kiccaṁ, adhikaraṇañceva kiccañca?
pli-tv-pvr11:63.2: Siyā kiccaṁ kiccādhikaraṇaṁ, siyā kiccaṁ no adhikaraṇaṁ, siyā adhikaraṇaṁ no kiccaṁ, siyā adhikaraṇañceva kiccañca.
pli-tv-pvr11:64.2: Yā saṅghassa kiccayatā karaṇīyatā apalokanakammaṁ ñattikammaṁ ñattidutiyakammaṁ ñatticatutthakammaṁ—
